name: Classix Solitaire
description:
Classix Solitaire is a classic solitaire card game, also known as Klondike or Spider.

Klondike is played with a standard 52-card deck. The aim of the game is to arrange the cards by suit in order from Ace to King in four piles.

The following settings are available in the game:
- 3 difficulty levels
- 6 different decks
- 77 covers (11 patterns in 7 colors)
- automove
- hint
- undo
- right- or left-sided interface
- portrait or landscape mode
- animation speed
- sound volume

You can hide all the UI elements to make the game more convenient.

The game has a scoring system. Time and difficulty level affect the final score.
